pageProps.content:
Experience

Contemporary & stylish, The Olive Exclusive is tucked away in a quiet corner of Windhoek – Namibia’s capital city.
Small & intimate, The Olive Exclusive is a luxurious choice for the discerning traveller hoping to stay over in Windhoek before or after a Namibia safari, & the ideal base from which to explore the city & surrounds.

Stay

The Olive Exclusive has 7 individually decorated suites, reflecting the different regions in Namibia.
Each suite has a lounge area with a fireplace, a dining room for in-room dining as well as a spacious deck with a day bed & private plunge pool.
The restaurant at The Olive boasts a seasonal menu, offering inventive & signature dishes & the well-stocked bar features a classic selection of fine whisky & premium wines.

Activities

Activities at The Olive Exclusive include getting pampered in the wellness spa, taking a refreshing dip in the swimming pool & private plunge pool or booking day trips to the city centre.

subfolders.title: Hilton Windhoek
subfolders.description: The Hilton Windhoek is located within the heart of Windhoek, Namibia’s capital city.  The hotel promises modern, lavish accommodation & world-renowned hospitality. The Hilton brand is renowned for its excellent hospitality, good choice of restaurants, luxurious accommodation & family-friendly atmosphere – it is no wonder that many discerning travellers choose to spend a few nights here.

subfolders.title: Omaanda
subfolders.description: Omaanda is a unique lodge located within a private nature reserve a short drive from Windhoek’s Hosea Kutako International & Eros Domestic Airports. Omaanda is the ideal stop-over before or after a Namibia safari & especially an ideal choice for guests who are looking for a nature-based stay, away from the city’s hustle & bustle.

Small & intimate, The Olive Exclusive is a luxurious choice for the discerning traveller hoping to stay over in Windhoek before or after a Namibia safari, & the ideal base from which to explore the city & surrounds.
